text: Forleo is a surname. Notable people with this surname include: * Francesco Forleo (1941–2018), Italian politician, former Deputy from 1987 to 1994 * Maria Clementina Forleo (born 1963), prominent Italian preliminary judge * Marie Forleo (born 1975), American life coach, motivational speaker, author and web television host Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Forleo
